actionCalls.description: Converting worktrail record collection to JSON using Apex class - ArchiveHelper. ArchiveHelper accepts only record collection as a parameter.
actionCalls.name: Convert_worktrail_to_JSON
actionCalls.label: Convert worktrail to JSON

assignments.description: Adding output from ArchiveHelper to a collection.
assignments.name: Add_worktrail_to_archive
assignments.label: Add Worktrail To Archive

assignments.description: Adding AMS related fields from Worktrail object
assignments.name: AMS_Worktrail_fields
assignments.label: AMS Worktrail fields

assignments.description: Assigning values to the archive entry fields.
assignments.name: Archive_entry
assignments.label: Archive entry

assignments.description: Adding IPS related fields from Worktrial object
assignments.name: IPS_Worktrail_fields
assignments.label: IPS Worktrail fields

assignments.description: Adding worktrail record to a worktrail record collection variable.
assignments.name: Worktrail_collection_to_convert_to_JSON
assignments.label: Worktrail collection to convert to JSON

decisions.description: Maximum length of the archive data field is 130000 characters. Formula field isWorktrailExceedsMaxLimit is used to check for maximum limit.
decisions.name: Is_worktrail_exceeds_maxlimit
decisions.label: Is worktrail exceeds maxlimit ?

decisions.description: Adds samtalereferat field to task record.
decisions.name: Task_Logg_kontakt
decisions.label: Task - Logg kontakt

decisions.description: Adding fields according to the type of meeting
decisions.name: Type_of_meeting
decisions.label: Type of meeting

Flow.description: Archives worktrail one year after status - Ended

formulas.description: Returns true when archive data exceeds max limit. Archive data is output from the ArchiveHelper Apex class.
formulas.name: isWorktrailExceedsMaxLimit

formulas.description: The field storing archive data is - Long Text Area(131072). Limited to 90,000 characters to avoid exceeding the maximum limit when Base64 encoding is applied.
formulas.name: isWorktrailFileTooLong

Flow.label: IPS - Archive worktrail

recordCreates.description: Creates an log when creating archive entry fails.
recordCreates.name: Application_log
recordCreates.label: Application log

recordCreates.description: Creating an archive entry which will be sent to archive using a record triggered flow.
recordCreates.name: Create_archive_entry
recordCreates.label: Create archive entry

recordLookups.description: Gets subgoals(Delmål), tasks(Oppgave), contact log(Kontaktlogg) related to worktrail.
recordLookups.name: Get_Subgoals_Related_To_Worktrail
recordLookups.label: Get Tasks Related To Worktrail

subflows.description: Using subflow which creates archive entries. Each archive entry will have split archive data. This subflow is used when the archive data exceeds the maximum limit of the archive data field.
subflows.name: Create_archive_entries
subflows.label: Create archive entries

variables.description: Will be used in subflow : IPS - Create archive entries subflow, to split the data into small chunks that are within the maximum limit.
variables.name: worktrailDataToSplit

variables.description: Used to add worktrail record. This variable will be used as parameter in Apex class ArchiveHelper.
variables.name: worktralCollection
